pr_title: Keep state lock for duration of journal context

timeline.message: Hold state lock for duration of journal context

timeline.bodyText:
Can't we leave the Journal interfaces the same but wrap context here with a forwarder context that holds the lock.
So Journal implementations wouldn't need to manage the lock.
timeline.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText: I added a new journal context for the state change lock
replies.author: gpang

timeline.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText: O, I think this is strictly more correct, since mJournaledNextContainerId is protected by mBlockContainerIdGenerator.
replies.author: gpang
